title: Covert2ICO
description: This project uses Svelte and Express. It takes a PNG or JPG and the backend converts the image to an ICO.

title: Earth World Map
description: This project uses React and Maplib. It's an interactive map that gives facts based on the countries selected.

title: Vacation Destination
description: This project allows for users to make and edit vacation destinations. Log in easily with username and password 'user'
